data.name: The Good Left The City
data.detailed_description:
"I certainly hope you believe in something...

...every Story has to have an end...”

The Good Left The City: the conclusion to Alix: A MONITOR Story.

The shady organisation known as Cygnus is closing the net on two rogue agents from different agencies: James Carter and Alix McClair.

Helped by an Artificial Intelligence named Sundry who has greater plans for both of them, the final years of the MONITOR universe will unfold to the end of everything.

A short novel story released for free; simply open your steam client and load up the PDF to enjoy!

Every
Story
Ends.

----

For all the fans of MONITOR that got every ending, thank you. This is for you.

Please consider this as the final story to ALIX: A MONITOR Story and the bridge to the ending of All and Sundry within MONITOR.

Without all of you, I would never have gotten where I am today within the Games Industry.

Yet again, thank you.

Dave Price (DNT Games)

Minimum:
  • OS: Any Apple version that can run a PDF

data.legal_notice: All relevant stories, concepts, images and music belong to DNT Games, 2017.

content_descriptors.notes: Themes related to sexual abuse of main character.
